ðŸ“– Summary: Gramax is an open-source, local-first documentation tool that uses a docs-as-code approach. It allows users to create, edit, and publish documentation using Markdown, with a visual editor and Git integration. It supports various features like multilingual support, advanced editing capabilities, and documentation portal generation.
